subtitle: This is a recipe that can be served any time of the day. To vary replace the smoked haddock with smoked salmon trimmings.

method.text: Cook rice in boiling water until tender. Drain.
Put fish in a pan with milk or water to cover. Poach for 12 min or until cooked. Remove from pan and break into large flakes, discarding any skin and bones.
Melt butter in a large pan. Add rice, smoked haddock, chopped eggs and peas. Stir gently to mix. Pour in fresh cream and cook on a low heat, stirring continuously, until thoroughly heated.
Just before serving, stir in dill, half the chives and the cheese. Season to taste.
Serve topped with sliced hard-boiled eggs and sprinkle with remaining chives.

title: Caerphilly kedgeree
